name: Hella Fresh Express
description:
Hella Fresh Express - Available on the Google App Store

Create a UNIQUE SOUL FOOD for every customer! Combine 5 CHOICE TOPPINGS with one of 3 MOUTH-WATERING ENTREES!

Remember who you serve; if you don't serve them their UNIQUE SOUL FOOD, they get their meal free.

Rent is $50 times the total days you've had your stand out, charged daily. Be sure to make your keep!

Controls: Click-click-click; select toppings and an entree, select a customer.

-----------------------------------------------------

|| Designed by Tyson Moll  || 

|| Programming by Brigham Moll || 

|| Music and SFX by Alex Metcalfe ||
